price: 60. Mpe botutu elandaki bango awa nanse mpe kino o mokolo mwa suka ekozala lokola, ya sôló ba aad bapengwaki penza na Nkolo wa bango, kasi ba aad bazala mosika (babebisama) bato ya Hûd?
arabic: وَأُتۡبِعُواْ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعۡنَةٗ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ عَادٗا كَفَرُواْ رَبَّهُمۡۗ أَلَا بُعۡدٗا لِّعَادٖ قَوۡمِ هُودٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-ut'biʿū fī hādhihi al-dun'yā laʿnatan wayawma al-qiyāmati alā inna ʿādan kafarū rabbahum alā buʿ'dan liʿādin qawmi hūdin
